farmLoans.title: Farm Loan Hub
farmLoans.subtitle: Connect with banks offering low-interest agricultural loans. Compare rates, calculate EMI, and apply directly through official bank websites.

tokenForm.title: Token Registration System
tokenForm.subtitle: Register for agricultural services with enhanced security and location verification

priceEstimation.title: Crop Price Estimation
priceEstimation.subtitle: Use our AI-powered tool to estimate the market price of your crops based on various factors
priceEstimation.marketAnalysisDesc: Our AI analyzes current and historical market data to establish baseline pricing trends.
priceEstimation.resourceEvaluationDesc: We factor in your land size, water availability, and soil type to refine the estimate.
priceEstimation.yieldPredictionDesc: The system predicts your potential yield quality based on the provided information.
priceEstimation.priceRangeGenerationDesc: You receive a comprehensive price range with minimum, average, and maximum estimates.
priceEstimation.profitTip: Farmers who use price estimation tools can increase their profit margins by up to 15% by timing their market entry more strategically.

directMarket.title: Direct Market Access
directMarket.subtitle: Connect directly with consumers and industries to sell your produce without intermediaries

homepage.farmShieldDescription: AI-powered wildlife risk intelligence system reducing human-leopard conflicts in Maharashtra's sugarcane belt
homepage.alertsDescription: Live leopard movement tracking with <2 min response time
homepage.accuracyDescription: Advanced ML models trained on Maharashtra wildlife patterns
homepage.coverageDescription: Junnar, Mulshi, Nashik Rural & 5 more conflict zones

prices.title: Crop Prices
prices.subtitle: Get the latest prices of various crops and commodities across different states. Prices are updated daily and show market trends.
prices.searchPlaceholder: Search for crops (e.g., wheat, rice, cotton...)
prices.noCropsFound: No crops found matching your search criteria.

cropHealth.title: Crop Health Analysis
cropHealth.subtitle: Upload images of your crops to get AI-powered health assessments and recommendations
cropHealth.howItWorksDesc: Our AI system can detect diseases, nutrient deficiencies, and other health issues
cropHealth.visualAnalysisDesc: Our AI algorithm analyzes visual patterns, colors, and textures in your crop images.
cropHealth.diseaseDetectionDesc: Identifies common crop diseases like leaf rust, powdery mildew, and blight with high accuracy.
cropHealth.healthAssessmentDesc: Provides an overall health score and identifies specific areas of concern.
cropHealth.personalizedRecommendationsDesc: Offers tailored suggestions for treatment, fertilization, and care based on the analysis.
cropHealth.seasonalCropsDesc: Recommended crops for the current season, common diseases, and treatment options
cropHealth.dataUpdated: Data updated for {season} growing season in India
cropHealth.consultExperts: Always consult with local agricultural experts
